roleset.name: help, assist
roleset.note: ASSIST-V NOTES: Member of Vncls help-72-1. Comparison with 'help'. (from assist.01-v)
ASSISTANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb assist.01, OntoNotes grouping assistance-n sense 1; maps to VN class help-72-1. Framed by Claire. (from assistance.01-n)

roles.note: Args 2 and 3 are reversed from 'help' (from assist.01-v)

example.name: all arguments present
example.text: Sotheby's vice president Diana Levitt says the auction house has been ``assisting'' Mr. Paul in selling the paintings.

example.name: missing assisted entity
example.text: Price Stern Sloan Inc. said it hired [an investment banking firm]-2 *trace*-2 to assist in evaluating restructuring or merger alternatives and reported a net loss of $8.1 million, or $2.14 a share, for the third quarter ended Sept.
example.arg: in evaluating restructuring or merger alternatives

example.name: missing project
example.text: The troubled Minneapolis-based railroad concern said the committee has the authority to hire [financial and legal advisers]-3 *trace* *trace*-3 to assist it.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The UN's assistance to Africa began several years ago.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Wu suggests that organizations in Taiwan which are dedicated to teaching management methods , such as the China Productivity Center , should assist companies in systematizing and selling the rights to their mangement and operating philosophies , so that the uniquely flexible Taiwan approach to business can be reproduced and marketed worldwide .
example.arg: organizations in Taiwan which are dedicated to teaching management methods , such as the China Productivity Center
in systematizing and selling the rights to their mangement and operating philosophies , so that the uniquely flexible Taiwan approach to business can be reproduced and marketed worldwide
